description: Detects the creation of an executable by another executable
name: Creation of an Executable by an Executable
query: ((process.executable:*.exe AND file.path:*.exe) AND (NOT ((process.executable:"C\:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\svchost.exe" AND file.path:C\:\\Windows\\SoftwareDistribution\\Download\\Install\\*) OR (process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\* AND process.executable:*\\TiWorker.exe) OR (process.executable:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\msiexec.exe") OR (process.executable:"C\:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\cleanmgr.exe") OR (process.executable:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*) OR file.path:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*)) OR (process.executable:C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\*) OR (file.path:*\\Microsoft\\WindowsApps\\*))))
author: frack113
